nodes.text: "Save The Hydenock" was a campaign started by Gungan conservationists on Ohma-D'un, the recently colonized moon of Naboo, when the hydenock trees threatened to become extinct. At the same time, however, New Otoh Gunga planners wanted more hydenock harvested. As a consequence, a third party was called in to lead the hydenock reforestation effort while ensuring that the Gungan colonists got the building supplies they required.

The "Save The Hydenock" environmental campaign was first mentioned in "Hydenock Campaign," one of the thirteen eco-challenges available in the mission mode of the 1999 video game Star Wars Episode I: The Gungan Frontier.
